tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crop_growth_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name TEXT,
  planting_date DATE,
  growth_stage TEXT,
  yield DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE GrowthData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(255),
    growth_stage VARCHAR(255),
    growth_date DATE,
    growth_notes TEXT
);
